dc_description_s: Cover title: The latest map of Japan for travellers.; Includes text.; Insets: Taiwan, 1:4,500,000.--Karafuto, 1:6,000,000.--Hokkaido, 1:3,000,000.--Chishima, 1:6,000,000.--Osaka, 1:8,000.--Kyo?to, 1:80,000.--Ogawasara-jima, 1:6,000,000.--To?kyo, 1:50,000.; Advertisements on verso.|58 x 87 centimeters|Scale 1:2,200,000|General Map Collection
